name: Reference - CAR-2021-05-001: Attempt To Add Certificate To Untrusted Store - MITRE
x_kb_abstract: Adversaries may add their own root certificate to the certificate store, to cause the web browser to trust that certificate and not display a security warning when it encounters the previously unseen certificate. This action may be the precursor to malicious activity.
x_kb_reference_title: CAR-2021-05-001: Attempt To Add Certificate To Untrusted Store
